name: Violent Frog
description:
Created by Nathan Lacsamana and Zoi Meaders!

-----HOW TO PLAY------

Ways to play: Singleplayer, Multiplayer, Singleplayer with AI Companion

Collect ingredients in the overworld, then go to the arcade world to battle waves of enemies trying to attack your precious lily pad! Earn XP from your battles, then make soup back in the overworld to upgrade your frog. Along the way, free the little frogs trapped in the bottles (but don't hurt them >:D )

-----CONTROLS------

For First Player

---

WASD to move 

SPACE to shoot

TAB to pull up stats

Q for recipies

E to Interact

For Second Player

---

Arrows to move

R CTRL Interact

/ Teleport to player

R SHIFT Attack

AI Companion

---

Takes on the role of the second player.

When you attack a damageable items, it will go to that location and attack as well.
